meaningMnemonic: <radical>Dirt</radical> makes it <radical>easy</radical> to identify your <kanji>location</kanji>. Even if you add an extra line to mark the ground, it's still easy. Keep that in mind and you can go from <kanji>place</kanji> to place.
readingMnemonic: Knowing your <kanji>location</kanji> from dirt is quite a feat! Who taught you that? It was <reading>Joe</reading> (じょう), the big local farmhand. Despite being a bit weird, he can identify any <kanji>place</kanji> just from its dirt!
